alert.note: Alert for East Sweetwater County; Flaming Gorge; Rock Springs and Green River; South Lincoln County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 22 at 1:35AM MST until November 24 at 2:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THURSDAY TO 2 PM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 30 to 40 mph. * WHERE...South Lincoln County, Rock Springs and Green River, Flaming Gorge and East Sweetwater County. * WHEN...From 11 AM Thursday to 2 PM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could become very difficult late Thanksgiving afternoon and evening due to the combination of snow and wind. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snow and strongest wind is likely to occur between 3 PM Thanksgiving and sunrise Friday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: East Sweetwater County; Flaming Gorge; Rock Springs and Green River; South Lincoln County
